original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Mystery of the Easter Chipmunk
overview: Rabbits and rodents go together like pop standards and achingly high-pitched voices; so it was only a matter of time before Alvin, Simon, and Theodore gathered for an Easter-time celebration in search of the greatest hare of them all--the Easter Bunny. But will following the rabbit's multicolored trail lead them to the legendary egg-bearer, or on an even wilder adventure? Included here are four additional Chipmunk cartoons.
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Mystery of the Easter Chipmunk
